website_summaries.verdict: Target your legs, arms, back, chest, and core with this high-capacity Olympic weight bench.
pros: Five back pad positions, curl bar, and rack help you create a comprehensive exercise routine
Thick pads make for a comfortable workout
Rack can be used for squats
Offers some storage of Olympic plates
cons: Requires additional purchase of weights and plates

customer_reviews.title: Seat busted on first workout
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, great to look at, but after one chest day, the seat is bent. The seat and back portions of the bench are constructed of a weak plywood. Throughout my first workout I could here it cracking and feel it bending under my glutes. Everything else about the bench is perfect, but the seat is already wasted so the bench is no good to me. $260 gone.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J Stark

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE WITH THE SUPPORTS
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you clamp the barbell supports or you could get hurt! If you try to roll the bar forward the supports will come lose and the bar will hit your head and hurt you really bad !! The bicep machine doesn’t extend all do way down. Don’t squad or bench press with more than 225 or this thing shakes like a mother. Lol Ok for a starter but not for somebody that lifts for real. Pretty disappointed, returning tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: gari

customer_reviews.title: Very good just one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Very good bench press machine. Can do incline, decline, and flat. Everything is perfect easy to assemble BUT, the only issue i have is with the barbell support bracket. As seen in the picture and video, if you try to position your barbell before benching (either moving barbell to left or right) the support bracket twists and can unlock. This is dangerous and cause serious injury. I am going to add some extra clamps so it doesnt move. The other issue with the support bracket is that it doesnt have a rubber coating, so the barbell is scratching the bracket. Will have to add some rubber on it. Otherwise great
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time used!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bench quality is overall good with the exception of the seat. The seat is made if thin plywood and has no support on the sides at all. It's a very poor design with cheap materials and snapped the first time I used the bench. Now I'm going to have to rebuild the seat with a steel plate when I have the time or make a bench seat to sit on top of the entire seat that would actually be sturdy, but then I won't be able to use it as an incline bench. Buyer beware and shame on this company for such a lousy design and cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: The bracket arms, that hold the weight bar, stick out way too far. In order to prevent the weight bar from banging into the side brackets during bench press, the user needs to position his body much further down the bench than usual, which makes it very hard to initially lift off the bar while lifting heavy weight.
customer_reviews.author: John O

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, very well packaged and exceptionable
customer_reviews.text: I rarely do product reviews unless an item is exceptionable and this is the case for the Marcy Olympic Weight Bench. First, I was impressed with the packaging. Every part was encased with bublerap and or form which at times wa a bit difficult to remove but this resulted in a product with absolutely no scratches which impressed me. Assembly was not difficult as the instructions were clear and simple. This weight bench is sturdy and the range of motion is outstanding. Overall I was impressed with the product, its packaging, ruggedness, ease of assembly, and overall quality. Semper Fi!
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Quality is ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: When seat is in full forward position, the back does not stand all the way. So if you are working thighs out, there is not good back support. Issue for those with lower back pain. Movement of bicep curl is very small. Does not extend fully out and does not come all the way up as it is blocked by the elbow rest table. I had to add my extensions fix these issues. Built a support to keep the back upright when seat is fully forward. Now working on the extension to fix the bicep curl issue.
customer_reviews.author: AN Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I hated installing it.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool device, for those at homer’s and do it yourselfers that don’t want a gym membership. Best decision I made. Though I hated the installation process took longer cause they suck at instructions and making things simple. I have put things together many times but for some reason this took me 5-6 hours . And I was missing an important piece but found 1 comparable at the hardware. Owe and it’s heavy and got some weight. Should go in a basement or cemented area
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Shopper 3000

customer_reviews.title: Quality for Your Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: Marcy provides a high quality product for home use. Many other companies produce a lesser quality product and charge the same or even higher price. Their customer service is excellent, and you actually get to talk with a live person! The design of this bench accommodates a huge variety of exercises you would use on many different machines in the commercial gym. I would recommend this product as a great value for home gym use.
customer_reviews.author: Sled in FL

customer_reviews.title: Completely Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived completely damaged. All of the parts were chipped, gouged, and scratched. What was supposed to be a brand new piece of gym equipment looked like it had been used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Good multi-function machine for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall good machine for the cost (I paid $299). Sturdy, looks nice, and has a lot of different utility modes. Assembly takes long (3 or 4 hours for 2 adult males), but was clear and all parts were included. Would have given 5 stars, but had to knock off points because the bench is just so/so, especially if you’re shorter and your back rests on the crevice between the “seat” and back rest. Recommend getting this for a home gym is space is an issue and you can’t go for a full squat rack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time - seriously
customer_reviews.text: Complete crap product - Came with 100 different pieces, extremely confusing- Took 3hours to set up Along with that - lacks sturdiness and instructions were super unclear - Totally disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to assemble, though range of motion is somewhat lacking
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put this together myself in about two hours. All parts are easily identifiable, and it came together without too much effort. However, my limbs may be a little too long for the leg-extension and arm-curl arms. They're not terribly adjustable to people who are about 5-foot-nine or taller. Still, I really wanted a good bench that could incline, with a bench and squat rack, and got what I wanted, so I'm very happy. Incidentally: one piece was broken in shipment, and the manufacturer turned around a replacement part with no trouble at all. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: John D. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Might kill you, might not
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy, might die maxing bench, might not. Who knows?
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mack

customer_reviews.title: Not really made for short people
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’1 and I have to have help with bench press because my arms are not long enough. The squat rack way too high. I had to drill new holders to drop it down for me to reach the bar. I wish some of the items could be removed. But overall it was a decent value for the money
customer_reviews.author: GraceAnne Colston

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative than the gym!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son had been looking for a new bench for awhile and jumped on this when it became available. Took a couple hours to put together but very sturdy! And overall a great price! It does take up some space which is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Not the best "cheap" option
customer_reviews.text: Wish I'd known more before we purchased. Height adjustments for bench pressing are not fine enough. Hooks to hold and catch bar are poorly designed, getting in the way as you try to exercise. Would have been better off and safer buying a half cage and bench. As is had to spend additional $s to buy a pair of bench press stands. Can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Litefever

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good bench with adjustments it becomes an very good bench.
customer_reviews.text: Will make this very short and to the point. The bench is a great bench but the back is wobbly. It slides to the left and to the right along that back rod, after using it twice I came up with the solution weld some type of circular stabilization on that bar about the with of the track on the back of that bench and bingo no more wobbling.
customer_reviews.author: Eric E.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son. He put this together by himself. Took him about 2 hours. He loves it and has been using it every day. He’s 230 pounds and about 6’1. No problems using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality weight bench.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality weight bench for the person who is serious about working out at home or the office. I was pleasantly surprised at all of the various exercises that can be done with it. You can get an excellent total body workout legs, arms and core to keep you toned and fit until the gyms open back up. It does not come with barbells or weights so they will have to be ordered separately and do not get ahead of the assembly instructions each part has to be assembled in the proper sequence.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench. Quality design
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. My bar is a little short I guess. I had to make adjustments to where my weights sat to clear the tests on the top. Other than that I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Decent set up time--REALLY sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned about ordering a bench online with never seeing it, but with the coronavirus at large, I needed something to keep fit. I already had Olympic weights from years back, but no good bench. This bench is amazing. I can do squats. I can do all sorts of benches. I can do curls and leg curls and leg extensions. Really quality set-up here. I'm very happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best bench for a home gym ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I ordered this after watching a few YouTube videos... But I was very impressed. Assembly took about two hours and I took my sweet time... Don't tighten the bolts until the end, follow the instructions. I do bench, decline, incline, squats, leg curls, leg extensions and arm curls. I bought 300 lbs of plates locally to avoid shipping, now my home gym rocks. I highly recommend this bench.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Other than the brackets we have loved the unit and have no regrets purchasing it
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I recently finished our basement and made one of the rooms a home gym. The Marcy weight bench was simple to put together and took about an hour by myself. The only issue we have is that the two smaller brackets that the weight bar sits on are too long. They get in the way when you are doing bench press, etc. If they were a bit shorter that would have helped with this issue. Other than the brackets we have loved the unit and have no regrets purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn c.

customer_reviews.title: Works best if your short!
customer_reviews.text: It seems very sturdy, the seat wobbles but its due to construction and is sturdy non the less. Assembly did take 2 hours, however this is because the instructions suck. Use your normal manstructions and visualize the diagram to build this, its self explanatory. Last, range of motion sucks. Im 6'1" and this feels like its built for 4 or 5 foot person. To get through this, take the leg cushions off the top by the seat, and be careful not the scrape off the jewels, also the decline portion of the headbar is more of a flat portion and the other 2 are incline and steeper incline, like wtf?
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble, Very Nice Weight Bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a great weight bench. Our whole family uses it and it has been great for full body work outs. It was easy to assemble--it did take 2 people but, it is very sturdy. It is quality equipment--the same you would see in a commercial gym.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: All ends well
customer_reviews.text: I love the rear of the bench because it allows me to do my front squats. I had to buy a long bar because a short bar will not work when you are using the barbell on the bench. I don't like the plastic ends because they keep popping out when I am working on my legs on the bench. I would have preferred a screwed in design rather than a plastic push in cap. Other than those pesty little caps. I am very happy with the design, build, strength, and versatility of the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy bench, it has so many different workout options on it. I suggest using an Olympic 7 foot bar for this, as it fits perfectly. The only complaint I really have about this, is that the preacher curl should have a little adjustment to it so I can get a full range of motion in the curl.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Very good home olympic bench
customer_reviews.text: I didn't run into any trouble with assembly, it came with the required tools. The bench is solid, and offers both flat and incline options, and it's easy to switch between them. There are a couple weight holders, but you'll most likely need a dedicated holder if you have a decent amount of olympic plates. It has a couple hooks on the back that can be used for squats
customer_reviews.author: M. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy a power rack and high quality bench
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to assemble, wobbly seat and bench despite multiple re-tightening. I bought this in a cost-savings effort over a power rack, which was a mistake. Save up some more money and buy a power rack and a higher quality bench instead. Buy once, cry once.
customer_reviews.author: Heidrich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent costumer service, great set up!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, took me about 2 hours to assemble by myself. Directions were very thorough, and very easy to follow. I’ve been using it for a week now and already love it. Great customer service. One of the parts were damaged, and I called The company, MARCY, and i was only on the phone for about 5 minuets and they sent a replacement for the damaged part. I’ve used their products in the past and would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for affordable quality weight equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This should really be a 4.5 Star review, but that's not an option.... Assembly was as annoying as any other item, but well within tolerable range. Sturdiness overall is good I weigh 270lbs and felt safe. The seat and backrest are definitely the weak point on this set. They need to be thicker and better supported, the wood backing is really not good enough, maybe metal or thicker wood? Overall I am not sorry at all I bought this set. For the money, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dubya

customer_reviews.title: Parts not labeled to let you know how to assemble it
customer_reviews.text: Received my package but the sad part is its a million parts and they didnt even label them so i could know exactly how to assemble it the assembly book didn't doooooooooooo any justice why even put the book in there if you not going to label the parts
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at this price point
customer_reviews.text: After shopping and researching I decided on the Marcy MD-857. The item arrived free of damage and as advertised. In around 2 hours I put the entire bench together by myself. This bench has most of what I need to get in a decent workout at home. It feels sturdy and durable for this price point. Keep in mind - I’m not benching 300 lbs. I think for the average person wanting a bench to provide a diverse workout, this is a great choice. I’m very happy with my purchase and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Solid performer
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all for an all in one home gym. Build is good. Foam rollers pretty cheep. Deformed easily during transit. Love the squat rack. Seat is wobbly, fixed with washers. DO NOT OVER TIGHTEN THE SEAT RAIL HEX BOLTS. You will warp and stress the cheap plywood. It will crack. And don’t use your seat bottom as support when your doing leg extensions. It will break. Leg bar needs a rubber stopper at bottom dead rest. Other than than, I can do everything with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Vroom

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Strong sturdy product - Works with both Olympic and standard weights - Easily adjustable setting for the bench/squat bar placement. - Easily movable on carpet. - Storage system for weights on the back - Easily adjustable seat&backpad + preacher curl station - Lock for the leg machine to allow you to hook your feet without it moving Cons: - Seat/backpad is wobbly. This doesnt mean that it isnt safe...its just odd. - Preacher curl pad gets in the way of the leg exercise. (Luckily you can easily remove the pad) - Preacher curl bar position isnt good...i rather just grab my own barbell/dumbell Overall, its probably the best bench you can get at this price
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I recommend buying
customer_reviews.text: I love that the screws, bolts, washers and etc are sealed in a package with the description above. Very easy to install with two people. The only negative part is the ease of use when it comes to using the leg part of the machine. It's time consuming taking the preacher curl and elbow rest pad off in order to use the leg attachment. Other than that, we are very happy with what we paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Delucchi

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions are a bit hard to understand, but once you get going it's a solid peice of equipment. I would also like to add I never leave reviews. This is a great bench 👍
customer_reviews.author: niki

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing home Olympic bench. For the beginner to intermediate you can get a full body lifting experience. Very versatile. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for our home gym at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about a year now and really like it. We did have a missing piece, but I called the company who promptly sent out another one. We haven't had any other issues with it. We are happy to have found a great piece for our home gym at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend to anybody
customer_reviews.text: Took everything out of box today 1/28/18. The majority of the contents is scratched up. Very dissapointed in the condition as this was suppose to be brand new setup. Could not find a inventory sheet so we shall see if everything is even there to complete install. Would not recommend to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Q.

customer_reviews.title: it's actually a really nice bench. The problem I had was that someone ...
customer_reviews.text: Well... it's actually a really nice bench. The problem I had was that someone returned it before I bought it and Amazon just re-shipped the same box without checking contents. The box looked like it had fallen out of every delivery truck and plane it had been in, and several parts were damaged and/or missing. Whoever returned it with a chair wheel to replace one of the lock pins, I really appreciated that. Anyhow, Amazon fully refunded my purchase and told me to keep the bench.
customer_reviews.author: CraigG

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bench. Has everything you need for the price. Highly recommended. A little difficult to put together but can be done with a couple tools.
customer_reviews.author: Its Me

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The plastic end plugs don't fit very well ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The plastic end plugs don't fit very well but it doesn't affect the performance of the bench. Like others have stated, the safety stops are ridiculous. The bar sits on my chest a full six inches away from the safety stops.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Decent bench
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the bench, it is very sturdy and for a home squat rack it works. The seat seems kinda cheaper than I expected but it doesnt wobble at all when you are using it so no worries there. The leg attachement is kind of hard to use and not as useful as i would have liked, if you put to much weight on it the seat leans forward. Overall I'm happy and hope it lasts a long time, the seat is the only part I can see ever breaking
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty! Easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Weight bench is pretty heavy duty. Assembling took my husband about 2 hours. Great quality. He's absolutely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kcruz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Olympic weight bench with 2” adapters pole for your weight
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen a lot of weight benches that are made with low quality products, but not with this weight bench. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia M.

customer_reviews.title: Legit.
customer_reviews.text: Solid Weight bench. Marcy a Nice piece for a great price. Son is prepping for College Football. Excellent purchase and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus L. Blakeney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at home Olympic bench
customer_reviews.text: Good bench press for at home use and was pretty easy to assemble. I am not a fan of the barbell rests on the bench since they look like they can come loose pretty easily and could potentially be dangerous. Also wish the seat was made of metal as opposed to wood. Overall though very happy to have a good quality at home bench press when all other equipment was sold out!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Portwood

customer_reviews.title: Defective - Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality is mediocre at best. Key pieces are defective - holes for bolts are to connect two major pieces are mis-drilled, and misaligned, making assembly impossible. Vendor has not replied to inquiry/complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Best set
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this set. Setup is fine if you have time and can follow directions, this set has almost everything we need and it all works well!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price! It does it all
customer_reviews.text: It allows us to do everything we want. Bench, IC bench, squat, leg extension & curls, arm curls. Bench works for dumbbell workout as well. Picture shows a 230lb person doing dumbbells. We have been using it hard for 3 months. Sold!
customer_reviews.author: DEL

customer_reviews.title: Parts
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd item I purchase with missing washer or nut and bolts very frustrating, then they don't make it easy for you to get them. Not very fair to the customer when pieces are missing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hurry up and Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in perfect condition, nothing missing . Very easy to put together, took me about 1 1/2 hr and im not handy. Unbelievable price for such a quality product. Well worth the buy, if your interested , hurry up and dont wait any longer, once I placed the order I was eagerly awaiting the arrival date and im not a patient person. Bench press,shoulder press, Quad extensions,ham curls,squats,bicep curts..etc...so many things you can do and these are all the machines that are always taken when im at the gym and when i do get to use, someone standing by me waiting. Definately so much better working out at home, private and you have time to focus on your workout.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Not for grown men
customer_reviews.text: Really cheesy construction. The bench wiggles way too much. Should tell people not to buy if you are taller than 5'7".
customer_reviews.author: Jason enns

customer_reviews.title: weight bench
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble as long as you follow instructions step by step. Very happy with the width as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena M.

customer_reviews.title: A good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Due to COVID-19, I purchased this product along with weights and barbells, so that I could work out from home. I was impressed with the straightforward packaging and labeling of the components and assembly instructions were as easy as IKEA. The material look and quality is very good and the overall bench is sturdy. Highly recommend the product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Buchner

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband has yet to use this, but it is a very good bench. Not too easy to assemble but it looks like and functions like the ones in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bench for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Squat side is just right for me at 6’1”. And great for bench press since the bench is attached to the rack you don’t have to worry about racking it to hard to where it might rock and fall back on you. Allowing you to fight for that extra rep and just dropping it back on the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Just what the husband was looking for to put in his weight room!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Jovel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So glad and lucky that I ordered this before the pandemic because I only payed $200. Fit perfectly in my low ceiling man cave(basement)
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good product, manufacturer lacking customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product, it came complete without anything missing. It was a very good value for the price. It so a good product. One issue I that is the hinge for the upper part of the bench where you rest your back. That was soldered on crooked. The chair would rest on to three points. I called customer service to speak with someone. I reached their voicemail asking for my contact information and they would call back. Problem is no one ever called. I eventually made use of my hammer/mallet to make adjustment. It is a good product but what if it was something that couldn't be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Temor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value bench system. Don't confuse that statement with it being a great bench system, it is a good bench system. But for the price, it is a great value. You will spend significantly more for a great bench system. This setup is fairly stable and is very versatile. I have been storing mine outside, but under a roof, for about a year and a half, and it seems to be holding up quite well. I don't think I have noticed any rust starting to form despite being outside.
customer_reviews.author: TucsonTRD

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I was admittedly a little skeptical about buying this type of equipment online without actually seeing it, feeling how sturdy it is, etc. I was happily surprised when the package arrived on time, well secured, and oh yea... HEAVY! (which is a good thing) When I got the box open I found all the parts intact, individually wrapped in plastic, oiled, and in perfect condition. The steel was heavier guage than I expected so once the bench was assembled it feels very sturdy. Now, it's not the Nautilus equipment you have at your gym that's built to take years of abuse, but for the home it's more than durable in my opinion. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This thing does it all almost and not very expensive great deal highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dimascio

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiance and he loves it. The only downside is that it is not easy to install alone, you need atleast 2 to 3 people.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: no compalins here great machine other than rust
customer_reviews.text: machine is great other than it rusting at the legs and inside the steel tubing
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bench with a ton of options. Great value for the price, and easy to assemble alone. The only problem I have (as mentioned by other reviewers) is the seat wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: NO INSTRUCTIONS! Worse purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Came without instructions! Really? Wow! Worse product I've ever bought. Plain stupid. The pdf instructions are difficult to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: All parts were there and in good shape. Took 2 hours to set up and ...
customer_reviews.text: All parts were there and in good shape. Took 2 hours to set up and only needed someone to help balance a few times when joining bigger pieces. Been using this machine for a month now and couldn't be happier. Screw going to the gym, this gives me the workout I need. It doesn't take up much room either. I was initially worried about how sturdy it would be on bench and squats but it barely moves when I rack the weight. I definitely recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Long assembly, and it is poor quality. Just about every connection is loose despite the most tightening you can do. They have extra space on every screw and so now I need to go to home Depot to buy more 3/4th inch washers to try and fill in the gaps to tighten this up. 2 people followed instructions carefully, it is either poor manufacturing or defects all over.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeLover

customer_reviews.title: Good over all
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to put together, range of motion can be limited due to the movable catches sometimes being in the way of arm movement usually not bad except for dumbbell flys. The bench is fairly wobbly though making some shifting during most lifts
customer_reviews.author: Grant Wollert

customer_reviews.title: Great home gym bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench wasn’t easy to put together but once together it is great. Has all key aspects of a bench and made very sturdy. Two pegs to store Olympic weight on back too.
customer_reviews.author: A & E Mom

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective design
customer_reviews.text: Two Bar Catch provided are longer than what ideally should be and interrupt in the exercise. When i called seller they said this is the size they provide and nothing can be done. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: PRERIT

customer_reviews.title: Great investment !!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Marcy weight equipment is an excellent choice for any home gym! I purchased the utility bench 3 years ago and it was great for home workouts , due to COVID Pandemic , I‘ve extended my home gym and I’m very pleased with Olympic Surge Bench !
customer_reviews.author: Capdriver

customer_reviews.title: ) and it felt very sturdy. Having worked out most of my life in ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my grandson who lives in another state so I have not used it myself. He says he loves it and has had no issues with it. I can state that his mother and grandmother assembled the bench in his bedroom in less than two hours. At that time, I got on the bench ( I weigh 195 lbs.) and it felt very sturdy. Having worked out most of my life in numerous gyms, I have no reservations in recommending this product for home gym use.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Invest in yourself
customer_reviews.text: My brother has one, so I had to get one. Easy assembly and great quality. Great for those starting out with their body building journey. Hey, why pay for a gym membership when you can get one of these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Candis Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Smooth delivery. East to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was flawless and came in much sooner than I expected. Package came in with all items complete. Assembly instructions was very detailed which made it easy to assemble. Looks durable. Waiting the weight plates and barbell ordered from another seller to test this bad boy out but so far I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Charly

customer_reviews.title: The package was sort of torn up with holes in it but it's a 120 pound package coming standard UPS so I was sort of expecting it
customer_reviews.text: Just got it this bench. The package was sort of torn up with holes in it but it's a 120 pound package coming standard UPS so I was sort of expecting it plus it said in the description there was going to be 10% defects and is why I got it at such a great deal. I had this bench years ago and really liked it and always regretted selling it so I am happy to have it again.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Bench is ok
customer_reviews.text: Bench is ok,no the best. To many pieces in the box but instructions is all you need and the are in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ledul

customer_reviews.title: Assembled it in an hour
customer_reviews.text: 2 days and already loving it . Looks more expensive than what it cost
customer_reviews.author: joel villalpando

customer_reviews.title: Great for home workout.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little wobbly and came with a few dings, otherwise it’s great for legs and chest workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Great Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: Due to the quarantine I was looking for a good home gym and I am proud to say I've found one for the price, you can do most vital workouts with this assembly. It was really quick to assemble, I think it only took me an hour to get everything up.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCISCO

customer_reviews.title: I had to cut the extra pole to bring the holes in place
customer_reviews.text: I had to cut the extra pole to bring the holes in place. Otherwise it seems strong equipment. I will update the review after use it for while.
customer_reviews.author: jagdish ram

customer_reviews.title: this one is great.
customer_reviews.text: HUSBAND LOVES IT. he had the bar just looking for a bench that was far enough out he wouldn't smoosh his big hands....this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Nice multi use bench
customer_reviews.text: Just finished putting this bench together today and am very pleased with the quality of it. This has a lot of options to it as you can see in the video that is listed in it's product description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong bench was sent to me
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a bench that was not the one advertised in the photo. It's nice and works my only complaint is it doesnt have decline option and that was the main reason i bought this product as shown in the advertised photos. Pretty dissapointed but i dont find it worth the time to send it back and hope that they replace it with the correct bench.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived early and it was easy to assemble. The bench was was very stable and was able to handle my body weight. The leg extension range of motion was a tight and I couldn’t get the range of motion I wanted. Overall I was very impressed with the bench.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great for in-home gym
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic piece of equipment for the price - sturdy and fits well in a small home gym. Read the reviews about stabilizing it, they were very helpful and with minimal adjusting it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Sz.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Good value
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Great value. Directions were about what I would expect. No real problem putting it together but it was more work than I thought. Put it together while watching a hockey game on TV and it took about 2 periods....maybe 1.5 hours I'd say. Very happy with this product but I don't have any other bench purchase to compare it to. It was my first (and last I'd say).
customer_reviews.author: mjs

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home gym
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. My 17 year old son uses ever day. Bought a separate set of weights.
customer_reviews.author: Hiipakka

customer_reviews.title: Solid equipment and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I just laid all the parts out in front of me and followed the directions. Everything was there! It took about 90 minutes to put together by myself. Good, sturdy, quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a good quality bench but it's pretty big. Fortunately I have extra room to put this in but this bench needs a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan A.

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for the home weight lifter.
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my home gym and Olympic weight set. I love the adjustability and versatility of the setup. I'm by no means a professional body builder, but do enjoy using free weights. Only criticism I'd have is that I wish the bench were a little bit easier to slide up and down, and that I could get a set of butterfly attachments. But that's what dumbbells are for.
customer_reviews.author: Caveman Dan

customer_reviews.title: items ordered should be delivered at the correct address!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item that I ordered was delivered to the wrong address, my kids and I have to carry it to bring home, this is a very heavy product. Also the bench part is not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: I love how I can do incline
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted and expected, as I've done my research to fit my needs. I love how I can do incline, lateral, and decline bench press, military press, preacher curls, squats, and legs extensions with one piece of equipment. I am satisfied with it, also, because it's solid and sturdy design. I'd recommend this to anyone who loves to workout and doesn't like waiting for a bench at the gym, it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome low cost bench machine
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product for about 2 months now and it is holding up great. For the price you can't really complain to much about it. My main complaint is that the bench is a little of the flimsy side, however it is still completely functional and is more than sturdy enough to support most. If you are looking for a low cost - multi function bench machine, this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: SoylentGreene

customer_reviews.title: Just what i wanted.
customer_reviews.text: my teen daughter uses it too. i am a desi and do not buy stuff if it is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SJJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together. It took just under an hour to get it set up. It looks really nice! Seems very sturdy. Now to get big...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: arrived almost before I bought it, so far works ...
customer_reviews.text: arrived almost before I bought it, so far works well. the versatility between standard and Olympic weights is just what I needed for my mix of weights. an instruction book on how to use the machine would be helpful
customer_reviews.author: Nernie

product_meta.title: Marcy Olympic Weight Bench for Full-Body Workout MD-857
product_meta.description:
Gaining your desired body shape requires hard work, discipline, and the best training exercise equipment. Make sure to get all of the benefits of exercise with the Olympic Surge Bench from Marcy! Created to combine superior functionality and utmost convenience, this fitness gear offers you a gym station right in the comforts of your home!

This fitness system is made out of rugged steel, foam, and vinyl. A heavy-duty tube frame completes the durable structure of this equipment. The powder-coated finish, the club-style akimbo uprights, and the high quality steel work effectively resists damage from intense use, guaranteeing you an investment that is built to last!

With the Marcy MD-857, you no longer need to leave the development of your underworked muscle groups to chance. Utilizing the four back pad positions allows you to pinpoint your pectoral workout, while the adjustable arm curl support pad and arm curl bar make total arm exercises simple and effective.

One of the unique features of this bench is the inclusion of two bar catches on the rear of the frame, which gives you the space and freedom to perform squats.

You also won’t have any excuse for missing out on leg day, as this fitness equipment has a leg workout station that lets you add some muscle to your lower body. This dual-function leg developer features a locking mechanism for performing abdominal exercises.

Achieve a stronger body without having to pay gym membership fees while simultaneously enjoying the comforts of your home with the Marcy Olympic Weight Bench!



AMAZON.COM
Work your chest, shoulders, biceps, legs, and more without trudging to the gym day after day with the Marcy MD 857 Olympic surge bench. The MD 857 is built tough, with a durable steel frame, upholstery-boxed padding with high-density foam for comfort, and a long-lasting powder-coat finish. More significantly, the bench makes it easy to perform a wide variety of exercises. The bench's adjustable seat and back pad, for instance, operate on a slide track that places the exerciser in the correct posture for military and chest press exercises. At the same time, the bench includes an adjustable preacher curl pad and a detachable bicep bar, so you can isolate your biceps for better bulk. To accommodate your legs, the MD 857 includes a dual-function leg developer with a pivot point and locking mechanism. The pivot point aligns the developer with your knee joints for improved efficiency and safety, while the locking mechanism lets you perform abdominal exercises while seated on the bench. The bench even offers a reverse walk-in squat feature for working your quads in an upright position. 

 Other features include contoured foam roller pads, adjustable bar catches, akimbo-style crutches with diamond striker plates, and two Olympic weight storage posts. Designed to fit Olympic-size barbell and weight plates, the bench measures 80 by 60 by 47.5 inches (W x H x D) and carries a two-year limited warranty on parts.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM STEEL CONSTRUCTION – Constructed from rugged, foam, and vinyl to provide sturdy exercise gear for long usage, the surge bench is safe and comfortable. The construction is compact and stabilized to provide optimal support for daily workouts!
MAX CAPACITY: Maximum weight capacity - 600lb (include user’s weight) | Maximum user weights - 300lb | Maximum user weights - 300lb | Maximum on Bar Catch - 300lb

DUAL-FUNCTION LEG DEVELOPER – Dual-features include a pivot point that aligns with the knee joints and a locking mechanism for abdominal exercise, this unit facilitates proper body posture and allows for maximum effect on the targeted muscle groups.

SEAT SLIDING TRACK – This exercise equipment boasts an adjustable seat and back pad with a slide track to conform to proper lifting positions. It allows you to achieve the enhanced benefits of an intense workout performed with precise body alignment.

WEIGHT PLATE STORAGE POSTS – This complete system features an innovative structure that combines weight plate storage posts and Olympic sleeves. This multifunctional training gear allows you to easily store your two weight plates.

VERSATILE FITNESS EQUIPMENT – Designed for full-body training at home, this surge bench can be utilized to target multiple muscle groups. It allows you to perform a wide array of strength-training exercises that focus on the arms, legs, chest, and core.
